error.message: Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\message_notify_ui\Form\MessageNotifyForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Most of the time static::entityTypeManager() is supposed to be used instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Most of the time static::entityTypeManager() is supposed to be used instead.

Parameter $manager of method Drupal\message_ui\Form\DeleteMultiple::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.

Parameter $temp_store_factory of method Drupal\message_ui\Form\DeleteMultiple::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\UrlGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\message_ui\MessagePermissions. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url instead.
Class Drupal\message_ui\Plugin\views\field\MessageUIContextualLinks was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to message_ui.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
